value.title: Prerequisites and Common Steps to Embed Report using Azure Function APP and JavaScript | Part 2
value.excerpt: Welcome to Power BI Embedded Step by Step series. Myself Dhruvin Shah. The entire series is dedicated to the Intermediate level of Power BI folks. The series covers step by step guide to embed the Power BI report in any third-party custom application or SaaS application. In this video we will cover,

value.title: Quickly create Power BI reports in Power BI Service
value.excerpt: Welcome to my new Power BI session to demonstrate the new feature which is just been rolled out by Microsoft. Now, we can quickly create reports using the Power BI Service itself. We don’t need to open the Power BI Desktop for the same. This new feature is being rolled out from December 2020 Power BI

value.title: Relative Time Slicer in Power BI
value.excerpt: In this session, we will discuss the new feature rolled out during the April 2020 Update of Power BI Desktop.  Now, we can add  Time Slicer with the OOTB date filter in Power BI.   With Relative Time Slicer, we can filter data based on the time.  Sometimes there are situations, where we need to filter

value.excerpt: In this video, we will talk about how we can resolve an error – “Contact your admin to enable code creation”. value.title: 3 steps to pin Reporting Services visuals to a Power BI Dashboard

value.excerpt: By default, your DirectQuery queries, in Power BI, will send a LEFT OUTER JOIN and could make your DBA not happy!
